name: Habanero Hearts of Palm Ceviche
description: This vegan hearts of palm ceviche will transport you to Mexico with the combination of habanero, lime juice, tomato, onion and hearts of palm

video.name: Habanero Hearts of Palm Ceviche
video.description: This vegan habanero hearts of palm ceviche recipe will transport you to the Mexican Caribbean with the combination of habanero, hearts of palm, onion, tomato, and cilantro marinated in lime juice. You can serve it on tostadas, eat with chips or even serve it as a salad.

recipeIngredient: 2 cans (14 oz.) Hearts of palm, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the hearts of palm in slices or half-moon pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the hearts of palm in slices or half-moon pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the hearts of palm, tomato, onion, and habanero pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine the hearts of palm, tomato, onion, and habanero pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the lime juice, olive oil, and cilantro. Mix well. (Hold off on seasoning it.)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the lime juice, olive oil, and cilantro. Mix well. (Hold off on seasoning it.)

recipeInstructions.text: Let marinate in the refrigerator for 30 min.
recipeInstructions.name: Let marinate in the refrigerator for 30 min.

recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt and mix to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Season with salt and mix to combine.
